1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
3
4-- | Options.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Option
7  ( Option,
8    OptionContent (..),
9    option,
10    optionBool,
11    optionParse,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Data.Map.Strict                      as Map
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                 as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Message         as Msg
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Message  as Msg
20
21
22type Option c = Map.Map String (OptionContent c)
23
24data OptionContent c
25    = OptionBool Bool
26    | OptionChar [Char] Char
27    | OptionTerms [S.TermName]
28      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
29
30option :: (D.CBool c, D.CText c) => Option c
31option =
32    Map.fromList
33           [ ("order"    , OptionBool False)
34           , ("sep-char" , OptionChar ":|" ':')
35           , ("forward"  , OptionTerms [])
36           , ("backward" , OptionTerms []) ]
37
38optionBool :: String -> Option c -> Bool
39optionBool name opt =
40    case Map.lookup name opt of
41      Just (OptionBool b) -> b
42      _                   -> B.bug "unknown option"
43
44optionParse :: (Eq c, D.CBool c, D.CText c)
45  => D.ContentCalc c -> [S.Token] -> B.AbMap (Option c)
46optionParse calc toks opt =
47    do assn <- optionAssn toks
48       B.foldM (optionUpdate calc) opt assn
49
50type NamedT a = ((String, [S.TTree]), a)
51
52optionAssn :: [S.Token] -> B.Ab [NamedT [S.TTree]]
53optionAssn toks =
54    do trees <- S.ttrees toks
55       case B.assocBy maybeName trees of
56         ([], assoc) -> Right assoc
57         _           -> Msg.adlib "extra input"
58    where
59      maybeName pt@(S.TextLeafRaw _ n) = Just (n, [pt])
60      maybeName _ = Nothing
61
62optionUpdate :: (Eq c, D.CBool c, D.CText c)
63   => D.ContentCalc c -> Option c -> NamedT [S.TTree] -> B.Ab (Option c)
64optionUpdate calc opt ((name, pt), trees) =
65    Msg.abOption pt $ do
66      case Map.lookup name opt of
67        Just oc  -> Msg.abOption trees $ upd oc
68        Nothing  -> Msg.adlib $ "unknown option: " ++ name
69    where
70      abc = calc $ S.ttreeGroup trees
71
72      upd (OptionBool    _) = do bool <- D.getBool abc
73                                 ins $ OptionBool bool
74
75      upd (OptionChar cs _) = do text <- D.getText abc
76                                 case text of
77                                   [ch] | elem ch cs -> ins $ OptionChar cs ch
78                                   _                 -> Msg.adlib "not one letter"
79
80      upd (OptionTerms _)   = do terms <- mapM D.treeToFlatTerm trees
81                                 ins $ OptionTerms terms
82                                                        
83      ins oc = Right $ Map.insert name oc opt
84
